#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstring>
#define ll long long int
#include <stdio.h>
#define mod 1000000007
using namespace std;
ll dp[1000006];
int main()
{
    ll i,j,k,m,n;
    dp[1] = 1;
    dp[0] = 1;
    for(i = 2 ; i <= 1000000 ; i++)
        dp[i] = (dp[i-1] + dp[i-2])%mod;
        cin>>n;
        while(n--)
        {
            cin>>m;
            cout<<dp[m]<<endl;
        }

return 0;

}
